item.description:
Hello Writers -

This coming meetup will be dedicated once again to the pursuit of writing! If you have any suggestions for writing excercises please post them on the message board. Kate will be soon forthcoming with a poll about possible writing exercises we can try. Vote for the one that appeals to you the most.

Hope to see you all there!

Alexa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there trying to save seats and reading
item.name: 20-30 Something Creative Writers of Boston April Meetup
